title: Rust Borrowing Ownership Fundamentals
description: In this lab, we learn about borrowing in Rust, which allows accessing data without taking ownership by using references ('&T') instead of passing objects by value ('T'). The borrow checker ensures that references always point to valid objects and prevents destruction of objects that are being borrowed.

meta.title: Rust Borrowing Concepts | Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Learn about borrowing in Rust, which allows accessing data without taking ownership using references. Understand the borrow checker and how it ensures references point to valid objects.
meta.keywords: Rust, Borrowing, References, Borrow Checker, Programming Tutorial

i18n.title: Rust 借用所有权基础
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们学习 Rust 中的借用，它允许通过使用引用（'&T'）而非按值传递对象（'T'）来访问数据而不获取所有权。借用检查器确保引用始终指向有效的对象，并防止正在被借用的对象被销毁。

meta.title: Rust 借用概念 | 编程教程
meta.description: 了解 Rust 中的借用，它允许使用引用在不获取所有权的情况下访问数据。理解借用检查器以及它如何确保引用指向有效的对象。
meta.keywords: Rust, 借用, 引用, 借用检查器, 编程教程
